posts.title: Grocery List
posts.body: Grocery List is a project made by Clara Mathews. This enables you to create a grocery list or you can change it to any other list according to your wish.

posts.title: Color Changer
posts.body: Color changer is a project created by Clara Mathews. It shows you the color you type in. This is great to understand some colors.

posts.title: React JS Blog
posts.body: This Blog was made by Clara Mathews. In fact ,this the blog that you're now looking at.
